sys_script_include.name: ItemFilterAjaxProcessor

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_c675a260938b061094e3f15a7bba1022
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.ItemFilterAjaxProcessor</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ItemFilterAjaxProcessor</name><script><![CDATA[var ItemFilterAjaxProcessor = Class.create();
ItemFilterAjaxProcessor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    filterItems: function() {
        var selectedCategories = this.getParameter('selectedCategories').split(',');
        
        var itemGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_item');
        itemGR.addQuery('category', 'IN', selectedCategories);
        itemGR.query();

        var items = [];
        while (itemGR.next()) {
            var item = {
                item_name: itemGR.getValue('item_name'),
                description: itemGR.getValue('description'),
                start_bid_amount: itemGR.getValue('start_bid_amount')
                // Add more fields as needed
            };
            items.push(item);
        }

        return JSON.stringify({
            items: items
        });
    }
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-24 08:56:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>c675a260938b061094e3f15a7bba1022</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ItemFilterAjaxProcessor</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c675a260938b061094e3f15a7bba1022</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lalitha</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-24 09:06:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
